entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Lynn Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:32 PM CST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Haze, -28.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Lynn Lake Airport 9:27 PM CST Saturday 28 January 2023
Condition: Haze

Pressure: 102.5 kPa
Visibility: 9.7 km
Humidity: 69 %

Dewpoint: -32.2°C

Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 32. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 32. Wind chill minus 37 this evening and minus 45 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 28 January 2023
